price: Si Tu les châties, ils sont Tes serviteurs. Et si Tu leur pardonnes, c’est Toi le Puissant, le Sage."
arabic: إِن تُعَذِّبۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ عِبَادُكَۖ وَإِن تَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ فَإِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in tuʿadhib'hum fa-innahum ʿibāduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
